name: the-store
description: An online store selling a variety of high quality products across many different categories.

operations.name: SearchQuery

tools.name: Search Products
tools.description: Searches for products based on a search query.

operations.name: Products

tools.name: Browse Products
tools.description: Shows products in a specific category with sorting and pagination options.

operations.name: Product

tools.name: Get Product
tools.description: Shows the details page for a specific product.

operations.name: AddToCart

tools.name: Add to Cart
tools.description: Adds a product to the users shopping cart.

operations.name: TopProducts

tools.name: Top Products
tools.description: Shows the currently highest rated products.

operations.name: UpdateCartItemQuantity

tools.name: Update cart item quantity
tools.description: Updates the quantity of a cart item. Setting the quantity to 0 will remove the item from the cart.

operations.name: CartQuery

tools.name: View Cart
tools.description: Shows the items currently added to the user's shopping cart.
